triples.relevance: The paper uses heuristic evaluation methodology adapted from Nielsen's approach for evaluating conversational agents.

triples.name: User interface design

triples.name: Conversational user interface
triples.relevance: The paper directly addresses usability evaluation of conversational interfaces between humans and machines.

triples.relevance: Paper adapts Nielsen's heuristics as the foundation for developing domain-specific heuristics for conversational agents.
